step1.title: One tap to what matters
step1.description: Create shortcuts to your most important files, links, and contacts. Access them instantly from your home screen.

step2.title: Create in seconds
step2.description: Select any file, link, or contact. Customize the icon and name. Add it to your home screen with one tap.

step3.title: Stay organized
step3.description: Schedule reminders, save bookmarks, and sync across devices. Your shortcuts, your way.

profile.accountDeletedDesc: Your account and all cloud data have been permanently deleted.
profile.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please try signing in again.

batteryHelp.title: Battery Optimization
batteryHelp.description: Some Android devices aggressively limit background activity to save battery, which can prevent scheduled reminders from triggering on time.
batteryHelp.warningMessage: If your reminders aren't firing on time, your device's battery optimization may be blocking them. Follow the steps below for your device brand.
batteryHelp.tip1: Keep the app open in recent apps (don't swipe it away)
batteryHelp.tip2: Disable any "adaptive battery" or "sleeping apps" features
batteryHelp.tip3: Exclude this app from any power-saving modes
batteryHelp.tip4: Restart your device after making changes
batteryHelp.samsungStep3: Go back to Settings → Battery → Background usage limits
batteryHelp.samsungStep4: Remove OneTap from "Sleeping apps" and "Deep sleeping apps"
batteryHelp.samsungNote: On One UI 5+, also check Settings → Battery → More battery settings and disable "Adaptive battery".
batteryHelp.xiaomiStep1: Go to Settings → Apps → Manage apps → OneTap
batteryHelp.xiaomiStep4: Go to Settings → Battery → Battery saver → disable it or exclude this app
batteryHelp.xiaomiStep5: In Security app → Battery → App battery saver → OneTap → "No restrictions"
batteryHelp.xiaomiNote: MIUI is very aggressive. You may also need to lock the app in recent apps (swipe down on the app card).
batteryHelp.huaweiStep1: Go to Settings → Apps → Apps → OneTap
batteryHelp.huaweiStep4: Go to Settings → Battery → Launch manager → set OneTap to "Manage manually"
batteryHelp.huaweiStep5: Enable all three options: Auto-launch, Secondary launch, Run in background
batteryHelp.huaweiNote: On EMUI 9+, also disable "Power-intensive prompt" in Battery settings.
batteryHelp.oppoStep1: Go to Settings → Apps → App Management → OneTap
batteryHelp.oppoStep3: Tap Battery → select "Don't optimize" or "Allow background running"
batteryHelp.oppoStep4: In Settings → Battery → High performance mode, add OneTap or disable battery optimization
batteryHelp.oppoNote: On ColorOS 12+, also check Settings → Special permissions → Battery optimization.
batteryHelp.oneplusStep1: Go to Settings → Apps → OneTap → Battery
batteryHelp.oneplusStep4: Go to Settings → Battery → Battery Optimization → OneTap → "Don't optimize"
batteryHelp.stockStep1: Go to Settings → Apps → OneTap → Battery
batteryHelp.stockStep3: Go to Settings → Battery → Adaptive preferences
batteryHelp.stockStep4: Disable "Adaptive Battery" or add OneTap to exceptions
